mutants.code:
import re

def entrance(word):
    word = re.sub('\\W+', '', word)
    word = word.lower()
    return word != word[::-1]

import re

def entrance(word):
    word = re.sub('', '', word)
    word = word.lower()
    return word == word[::-1]

import re

def entrance(word):
    word = re.sub('\\W+', 'MUTATED', word)
    word = word.lower()
    return word == word[::-1]

import re

def entrance(word):
    word = re.sub('\\W+', '', word)
    word = word.lower()
    return word == word[::+1]

import re

def entrance(word):
    word = re.sub('\\W+', '', word)
    word = word.lower()
    return word == word[::-2]

import re

def entrance(word):
    word = re.sub('\\W+', '', word)
    word = word.lower()
    return word == word[::-0]

import re

def entrance(word):
    word = re.sub('\\W+', '', word)
    word = word.lower()
    return word == word[::-0]

import re

def entrance(word):
    word = re.sub('\\W+', '', word)
    word = word.lower()
    return word == word[::--1]
